name: Scary Bean Game REMASTERED
description:
One of the scariest games you will play in your life...

Escape the Beans lair... How did you get there? I don't know.
Featuring 3 insane endings, loud jumpscares, and a creepy atmosphere...
Will you Escape the Bean?

You will never look at beans the same way again...

Don't forget to give a rating to show your thoughts!

Controls:

WASD- Move

Mouse- Look around

E- Interact

Tips:

How to get the true ending

After you have completed both the good and bad ending, create a new game. After you grab the key go back into the spawn room where you will find a red key. Continue to the next level, and open the second locked door. From then on it is quite obvious what to do 😃

Notes:

The original- https://snek247.itch.io/scary-bean-game
(Please don't play its really bad)
